text: MoDOT preparing for snow with annual winter weather drill Oct 10, 2024 Oct 10, 2024 Updated 1 hr ago 0 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save As featured on 1:12 MoDOT preparing for snow with annual winter weather drill Drivers may have noticed an increase in Missouri Department of Transportation trucks on the … Additional Videos 2:42 See St. Joseph: Hauntings and happenings Updated 1 hr ago 0:29 Woman dead following Wednesday police call on Commonwealth Updated 1 hr ago 1:28 News-Press NOW goes LIVE at groundbreaking ceremony at Krug Park Updated 1 hr ago 1:24 YWCA puts community 'In Her Shoes' Updated 1 hr ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Load comments × Post a comment as anonymous Emoticons [smile] [beam] [wink] [sad] [cool] [innocent] [rolleyes] [whistling] [lol] [huh] [tongue] [love] [sleeping] [yawn] [unsure] [angry] [blink] [crying] [ohmy] [scared] [sleep] [sneaky] [tongue_smile] [thumbdown] [thumbup] [censored] [happybirthday] [ban] [spam] [offtopic] [batman] [ninja] [pirate] [alien] Comment Text Cancel Post comment × Your comment has been submitted. anonymous × Report Cancel Report Abuse ×Reported ×There was a problem reporting this. × Watch this discussion.
